Package duke

Class Storage

java.lang.Object
duke.Storage
public class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
Loads data if any and saves user input in the same file.

  • Method Details

    • load

      public java.util.ArrayList<Task> load() throws DukeException
      Loads data in a .txt file into an ArrayList of tasks
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Task stored in a previously saved file if any or a new ArrayList.
      Throws:
      DukeException - If the type format in the .txt file is invalid.

    • save

      public void save​(TaskList tasks)
      Saves an ArrayList of Task in a .txt file
      Parameters:
      tasks - TaskList object consists of a list of task inputted by user
